title: Ethical Design Thinking-Based Science Project Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Core scientific subject theories and secondary education field experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening the flexible learning design capabilities of practicing secondary school teachers to adapt to post-COVID-19 educational environments.

learning_goals: Learners can apply an ethical design thinking framework to develop solutions that reflect stakeholder needs when designing science education projects.
Learners can implement prototypes and collect test feedback using team-based collaboration tools in a limited technological environment (smartphone utilization).
Learners can submit science lesson designs that consider social and ethical issues in educational settings through reflective practice at each stage of design thinking.

resources: Smartphone Collaboration Apps (Miro, Google Jamboard, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
